name: Pink Pong Dot Tap - The Twisty Epic Tennis Balls Of Incredible Souls
name_original: Pink Pong Dot Tap - The Twisty Epic Tennis Balls Of Incredible Souls
description:
Tap to block the splashy balls, the pink balls should go to pink paddle and blue balls should go to blue paddle

How many times can you do that?

*** Disclaimer - This game is highly addictive :) ***
You have been warned!
